Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: It allows me to ask more detailed question and "what if" questions way more often to Gen AI than to my teacher. I feel more convenient to ask extra question to Gen Ai than to teacher

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: compliment or positive feedback from Teachers is way more encouraging than from Gen AI. while Gen AI i dont really feel much when i receive feedbacks
